attributes.additional_details:
Poor Tyrone has endured months of physical and Mental abuse from his psychotic girlfriend Kirsty.
After he hatched a plan with Fiz-bomb to marry her (for parental rights over his daughter) it all went terribly wrong as Kirsty uncovered his plan to leave her with nothing.
Whilst arguing over who gets custody of their daughter Ruby, kirsty fell down the stairs and suffered severe injurys.
Kirsty has now told police that Tyrone pushed her and that he has been beating and terrorising her for months... Poor Tyrone is goin to get the book thrown at him.... Or is he?!?
Now I KNOW it's only a soap, but if the writers of corrie let Kirsty get away with these heinous crimes... Then I vow to stop watching corrie... And the more that sign this petition the more they may listen to us!!!
JUSTICE FOR TYRONE DOBBS!!!
